Title: A Gallagher Pedicure
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Mark Steilen
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona's homeless tenants barricade themselves inside her apartment. Lip takes in a terrified Sierra and Lucas when her father is released from prison, while Ian takes bigger action with his cult- like following.
